help.instructions:
907Bot tracks the availability of Social Service resources with basic SMS commands.

To get started, send 'Show All' or 'Show [number]' for a list Social Service categories or sub-categories.

Second, send 'Select [number]' to start managing resources for that Social Service type.
help.newuser: @908Bot - Hey, I don't recogize your phonenumber. Can I get your first and last name so I know what to call you?

show.noparameter: @907Bot - I need a parameter for your Show request, for example: 'show all'

select.noparameter: @907Bot - I need a parameter for your Select request, for example: 'select 102 04'
